name: Samuel S. LYNESS, M.D., Appellant, v. STATE BOARD OF MEDICINE of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania
name_abbreviation: Lyness v. State Board of Medicine

judges: Mr. Justice MONTEMURO is sitting by designation as Senior Justice pursuant to Judicial Assignment Docket No. 94 R1800, due to the unavailability of Mr. Justice LARSEN, see No. 127 Judicial Administration Docket No. 1, filed October 28, 1993.
parties: Samuel S. LYNESS, M.D., Appellant, v. STATE BOARD OF MEDICINE of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal quashed for failure to exhaust administrative remedies.
Mr. Justice MONTEMURO is sitting by designation as Senior Justice pursuant to Judicial Assignment Docket No. 94 R1800, due to the unavailability of Mr. Justice LARSEN, see No. 127 Judicial Administration Docket No. 1, filed October 28, 1993.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Jean B. Green, Donald J. Martin, Norristown, for S.S. Lyness.
John F. Alerón, Joyce McKeever, Harrisburg, for State Bd. of Medicine.
casebody.head_matter:
640 A.2d 411
Samuel S. LYNESS, M.D., Appellant, v. STATE BOARD OF MEDICINE of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 5, 1994.
Decided April 22, 1994.
Jean B. Green, Donald J. Martin, Norristown, for S.S. Lyness.
John F. Alerón, Joyce McKeever, Harrisburg, for State Bd. of Medicine.
